sources.title: The Price of Power (1969)
sources.description: "The Price of Power" is a 1969 Spaghetti Western that follows Bill Willer, played by Giuliano Gemma, as he seeks revenge for his father's murder while trying to thwart an assassination plot against President James Garfield, portrayed by Van Johnson. Set in 1881, the film intertwines themes of political conspiracy and personal vengeance, ultimately depicting Garfield's assassination and Willer's quest for justice.

metadata.Plot: In Dallas, an ex-Union soldier attempts to expose a conspiracy of Southerners who murdered his father, his friend and the President.
metadata.Writer: Massimo Patrizi, Ernesto Gastaldi, Tonino Valerii
metadata.Actors: Giuliano Gemma, Warren Vanders, Mar√≠a Cuadra
